title: Does Riot support this website?
body:
Ok so I found a website that gives out 4 free rp codes a day which requires you just to connect to your Facebook to enter the competition for the free rp. 
There is no need to click on this link if you think this is one of those refferal websites or you don't trust me. But if you really want to check it out for yourself  I would recommend going on it. 
**[Link Removed]**

I would like to know if Riot actually supports this website or if this website actually give away free rp codes.

replies.body:
If you look at the bottom of the page it does say 

League of Legends is a registered trademark of Riot Games Inc. We are in no way affiliated with, associated with or endorsed by Riot Games Inc.
